Update of Previous Forecast:
Crude oil and sheen observed on NE shore of North Star Island. Ice is either acting to contain wind driven oil, or oil is day-lighting out from melting sea ice. Oil spill response activities limited to to the sea ice, which is actively melting/ retreating from shore. The NE side of island does experience the most severe weather and sea state. Observations are from their AWS on deck of 6th floor of control building on site, approx elevation 90 feet above sea level, 80 feet above ground. **Primary need is the prevailing wind direction and speed.

hydra:member.remarks:
Good morning,
Assume responsibility on incident for Weather and Fire Behavior. 1000 acre new start wildland fire in SW riverside County. Updated location from previous forecast to reflect more accurate location and elevation. Most concern with building cloud cover for thunderstorm potential/threat. And shifting wind potential. May need one to two daily spot weather forecast and then will be looking to potentially develop a '3 day' or extended forecast as resource commitment diminishes. Thank you!
